2022-02-01.name: Zhen Dao Ge: Chen Shi Xing
2022-02-01.desc:
The story tells the story of Luo Tong, the young leader of Linqing Cao Bang, who is framed by his enemies for the murder of his father during a cargo shipment, and is then hunted by the government and martial artists.

source: bgm.tv/Deepl.com

2022-02-04.name: Shika no Ou: Yuna to Yakusoku no Tabi
2022-02-04.desc:
* Based on a fantasy novel series written by Uehashi Nahoko.

In the years following a vicious war, the Empire of Zol now controls the land and citizens of rival Aquafa – except for Aquafa's Fire Horse Territory, where wild dogs that once carried the deadly Black Wolf Fever continue to roam free. When a pack of dogs race through a Zol-controlled mine, Van, an enslaved former soldier, and a young girl named Yuna are both bitten, but manage to escape as the sole survivors of the attack. Finally free, Van and Yuna seek out a simple, peaceful existence in the countryside. But as the deadly disease once again runs rampant, they find themselves at the crossroads of a struggle much larger than any one nation.

Source: GKIDS

2022-02-06.name: Bakugan: Evolutions
2022-02-06.desc:
Strange occurrences begin to happen, elemental energy from Vestroia is seeping into Earth, creating strange phenomena and causing Bakugan to rage out with excess energy! It's not all bad though, as our heroes realize the Vestroian elemental energy is also causing elemental evolutions among our Bakugan! Along with these new evolutions comes a new breed of elemental brawlers, propelling the Awesome Brawlers to adapt and in effect, take Bakugan brawling to a whole new level, unlocking even more awesome powers and evolutions! Once again, the fate of two worlds, Earth and Vestroia, rests in the hands of the Awesome Brawlers and their Bakugan partners.

Source: Corus Entertainment

Note: Its broadcast started in Canada on Teletoon on 06.02.2022 and in Japan on streaming platforms on 1 April 2022.

2022-02-06.name: Delicious Party Precure
2022-02-06.desc:
The mysterious, delicious world of CooKingdom, which rules over all the cuisine in this world.

CooKingdom has closely guarded the Recipe-Bon, in which it's written how to prepare any dish. But, oh no! One day, it gets stolen by the Bundoru Gang!

The Bundoru Gang plans to monopolize everything for themselves, and their next target is the Cuisine Fairy Recipeppi...

The Energy Fairies have come to Oishi-Na Town in the human world in search of the Recipe-Bon. With their help, an unexpected turn of events leads to three ordinary girls transforming into Pretty Cures!

Source: crunchyroll

2022-02-06.name: Shenmue the Animation
2022-02-06.desc:
* Based on the video game series of the same name by Sega.

After he witnesses his father's murder at the family dojo, Hazuki Ryou dedicates his life to finding the man responsible—a mission that takes him from the streets of Yokosuka, Japan to the sprawling metropolis of Hong Kong, and beyond. Soon he will learn that larger, mystical forces are at play as he trains to become the ultimate martial artist in his quest for revenge.

Source: Crunchyroll

Note: The show premiered worldwide outside of Japan on Crunchyroll & Adult Swim starting from February 6th, ahead of the Japanese broadcast on April 7th.

2022-02-11.name: Kawaru Machi, Kawareru Machi, Ishinomaki. feat. Jun

2022-02-18.name: Fruits Basket: Prelude
2022-02-18.desc: It will depict the past of Kyouko and Katsuya, the parents of Honda Tooru.

2022-02-18.name: Goodbye, Don Glees!
2022-02-18.desc:
The boys, Rouma and Toto, meet when Rouma moves from Tokyo to the countryside, which he cannot grow accustomed to. But when he meets Toto, they become a duo, naming themselves "Don Glees." Eventually, Toto was supposed to move out to Tokyo for school, but on the summer of their first year of high school, they meet Drop, a new addition to Don Glees, who invites them to "view the world from above." When Rouma and Toto follow Drop, they become involved in a forest fire that gets blamed on them, and go off in search of a missing drone that has evidence of their innocence.

Source: ANN

2022-02-22.name: Uma Musume: Pretty Derby (2022)
2022-02-22.desc: A special anime commemorating the first anniversary of the Uma Musume Pretty Derby game's release.

2022-02-24.name: Qi Jie Diyi Xian
2022-02-24.desc:
Liang Xi, a fortune-teller for a living, saved the immortal Yu Wen Qing Yang out of a moment of kindness, and was taught by the immortal the true power of ten thousand years and the Seal of Turning Heaven, and has since embarked on the path of cultivation. Under the instruction of Yu Wen Qing Yang, Liang Xi went to the Heavenly Spirit Sect to learn the art from his teacher. On the way, Liang Xi met the little white fox who was inexplicably friendly and travelled together. He used the Heavenly Spirit Sect as a starting point for his training and made friends with his mentor, and by chance, obtained the mysterious weapon Kansui Blade from a demonic beast. The blade is the magic weapon of the founding master of the Yunlu Immortal Residence, and they demanded that Liang Xi return it, but they would not pursue the matter if he could get the dragon's breath to temper the blade, otherwise they would have to pay the price. When he saw that the Yunlu Immortal Residence was taking advantage of the situation, Liang Xi was determined to go to the East Sea to look for the dragons, but because he accidentally inhaled the dragon's blood, he became the first dragon's relative in heaven and earth. After explaining the situation to the Dragon God, Liang Xi fulfilled the request made by the Dragon God and succeeded in having the Kansui Blade quenched by the dragon's breath and also saved his division. The appearance of the Yunlu Immortal Residence is just an episode, just when the Heavenly Spirit Sect's head teacher, Daoist Qingmu, broke through the Golden Immortal and came out of the gate, a spatial rift suddenly appeared above the Heavenly Spirit Sect, from which the two-headed old man with a human-faced spider attacked in force, once taking Liang Xi captive outside the human realm, when his life was in danger, the Heaven Turning Seal erupted to save Liang Xi. The actual fact is that you can find a lot of people who have been in the business for a long time. The city is located in a special location, at the edge of the state of Chu, but also very barren, is located here in the sweet potato city is infested with bandits, Liang Xi in order to improve the sweet potato city to do a variety of efforts. After repelling the attack of the bandit group Red Hair Demon Army, in order not to wait for death, Liang Xi began to explore the situation of the bandit forces in the Sangqu River, but gradually discovered the legend of the Purple Emperor circulating in the seven realms of strange, and all of this gives Liang Xi a wonderful feeling of déjà vu, so Liang Xi is doubly surprised. In order to find out the truth of everything, Liang Xi continued to improve himself and explore further in the Seven Realms.

source: bgm.tv/DeepL.com

2022-02-25.name: Gekijouban Deemo: Sakura no Oto - Anata no Kanadeta Oto ga, Ima mo Hibiku
2022-02-25.desc:
* Based on a rhythm video game developed by Rayark.

Alone in a castle, a mysterious figure plays a piano... Deemo. One day, a little girl falls from the sky.
A castle littered with mysterious inhabitants, a sacred tree growing by the melody of piano, a girl with no memory, and Deemo.
A gentle story that will touch your heart.

Source: Official website
